talent.name: Gallant Blaze
talent.description:
Evaluation Basis: [Resonance Assessment 2893-G]

Resonator Chixia experienced her Awakening 6 years ago after being exposed to extreme temperatures and blazing flames.

Resonator Chixia's Tacet Mark is located in her lower left abdomen. Post-Awakening observations found a change in hair color to red and a significant increase in body temperature.

She is capable of converting the frequencies of high-temperature substances into tangible flame ammunitions. 
The Resonance Spectrum Pattern of Chixia has been observed to align closely with that of flames. A strong Syntony reaction has been observed, yet the cause of Chixia's Awakening remains unclear.


Analysis of test samples has revealed a non-convergent Rabelle's Curve with a steep rise in the middle section. Resonator Chixia is thereby classified as a Mutant Resonator.

combo_teaching.title: Chixia: <color=#d4bf5f>Basic Attack</color> Tutorial

combo_teaching.title: Chixia: Forte Circuit Tutorial-<color=#d4bf5f>DAKA DAKA!</color>
combo_teaching.description: Hold <color=#f4d582>Resonance Skill: Whizzing Fight Spirit</color> to enter the "DAKA DAKA!" shooting state.

combo_teaching.title: Chixia: Forte Circuit Tutorial <color=#d4bf5f>Heroic Bullets</color>
Chixia: Forte Circuit Tutorial <color=#f4d582>Boom Boom</color>
combo_teaching.description:
During the "DAKA DAKA!" shooting state, tap Basic Attack to perform 1 shot, dealing <color=#e15226ff>Fusion damage</color>, and exiting the "DAKA DAKA!" shooting state.
If Basic Attack is tapped when 30 "Thermobaric Bullets" have been consumed, fire 1 <color=#f4d582>Boom Boom</color> instead before exiting the "DAKA DAKA!" shooting state.

The attack launched after charging deals <color=#e15226ff>Fusion damage</color>, and grants Thermobaric Bullets on hit.
